channel.title: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?" - Anyone know any good tips? Ways? A guide perhaps?

item.title: Re: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded: It might be worth spamming B-rank ninjutsu missions if you're looking to do this too â€¦ there's a mission there that can give +20 stamina, and every bit helps. I'd say, though, that Legacy ninja have an advantage in this, with extra XP and an easier final check so Hottie Regeneration is easy to use. Of course, you could also keep the mission open for a couple of days to be able to use Jutsu again, but that's a last resort, I think.

item.title: Re: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded: The best power XP guide I've seen is here: http://z15.invisionfree.com/Imaginary_Village/index.php?showtopic=20

item.title: Re: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded:
Wait, I can't use more than on potion, since I need to be a Jounin to access the A-Rank Reaper missions, which are needed to get the hollow jaw's for the special missions. XD

Sorry, if someone, who's willing to, could sort of do a step by step guide, I have quite alot of the permanent items, but not as many as i'd like.

Got most of the level 2 allies, currently have 39 allys.

If someone could just tell me the best way to get alot of stamina for the next day, then do a step by step guide to getting the 500,000 daily xp. I'd be ever so grateful.

Thanks.

item.title: Re: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded: Thanks you guys, I'll try that out as soon as I can. :)

item.title: Re: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded: For the 500,000 daily XP, only 1 silver elixir. Two is good if you're going for #1 as well though.

item.title: Re: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded:
Team: Timmy lvl 2 + Pandabear lvl 2 + Pinky lvl 2
Jutsu: Obsessive Insight, Hottie Regeneration (do not use Hottie Regeneration until past the jutsu tests, and do not use if you cannot beat the boss with brute force)
Items: Two silver potions, a lot of smokebombs, Letter of Marque
Ryo: Zero (minimum needed) to 1,240,000 (maximum needed)
Spars: 49/99/149/199/249
Jutsu exp: 400,000 (only needed if your village has a ramen shop)
Seven day bonus: Maybe
Hairpin pieces: 3

item.title: Anyone know a pretty reasonable way to gain 500,000 Daily XP for the Jounin Acension Season 2+?
item.content:encoded:
I know of the party house, and such. But I'd be very grateful if anyone, could put it all together, items, jutsu, amount of ryo one should have for the party house ect.

Many thanks in advance.

Blazer.
